name: tree-sitter-stack-graphs-typescript
description: Stack graphs based navigation for TypeScript
author: GitHub <opensource+stack-graphs@github.com>

tree-sitter-stack-graphs-typescript.data.markdownDescription: The default location for the database, if an explicit path is not provided. _Requires reload for changes to take effect._
enumDescriptions: Use a workspace-local database. Indexing data will not be shared between workspaces.
Use the user database, stored in the user's local data directory. Indexing data is shared between workspaces.

tree-sitter-stack-graphs-typescript.data.markdownDescription: The path to the database. Expands ~ to the user's home directory. _Requires reload for changes to take effect._

tree-sitter-stack-graphs-typescript.inde.markdownDescription: Maximum index time per workspace folder in seconds (-1 means no limit). _Requires reload for changes to take effect._
Maximum index time per file in seconds (-1 means no limit). _Requires reload for changes to take effect._

tree-sitter-stack-graphs-typescript.quer.markdownDescription: Maximum query time per file in milliseconds (-1 means no limit). _Requires reload for changes to take effect._

scripts.build: npm run build-cli && npm run build-ext && npm run install-cli
